title: Create Calm: Ayurvedic Sprays for Stress Management
author: Harish
excerpt: Aromatic hydrosols like lavender and ashwagandha offer a gentle way to manage daily stress—learn where and how to use them safely.
content:
The Power of Aroma in Ayurveda

Aroma plays a subtle but potent role in calming the nervous system. Hydrosols—aromatic waters produced during steam distillation—offer a gentle, alcohol-free way to enjoy botanical scents without irritation.

Why Lavender + Ashwagandha?

  • Lavender: Widely known for calming and sleep-supportive effects.
  • Ashwagandha hydrosol: Adds an adaptogenic, grounding undertone to the scent profile.
  • Rose water: Adds cooling, uplifting balance—especially helpful for Pitta.

How to Use Anti-Stress Sprays

  1. Mist the pillow or room a few spritzes before bedtime or meditation.
  2. Use at your desk to reset focus and calm overwhelm.
  3. Avoid direct spraying on skin and test fabrics for staining.

Dosha Notes & Precautions

Most people tolerate hydrosols well, but those extremely sensitive to fragrances or with respiratory conditions should test cautiously. Pregnant women should consult their caregiver before using new aromatic products.

Shop Anti-Stress Spray and make calm a simple, everyday habit.
